verses.verse: And, behold, there came <WH935> <WH8804> a man <WH376> of 'Elohim <WH430> out of Y'hudah <WH3063> by the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> unto Beit-El <WH1008>: and Yarov`am <WH3379> stood <WH5975> <WH8802> by the altar <WH4196> to burn incense <WH6999> <WH8687>.

And he cried <WH7121> <WH8799> against the altar <WH4196> in the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, O altar <WH4196>, altar <WH4196>, thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>; Behold, a child <WH1121> shall be born <WH3205> <WH8737> unto the house <WH1004> of David <WH1732>, Yoshiyah-yahu <WH2977> by name <WH8034>; and upon thee shall he offer <WH2076> <WH8804> the Kohanim <WH3548> of the high places <WH1116> that burn incense <WH6999> <WH8688> upon thee, and men's <WH120> bones <WH6106> shall be burnt <WH8313> <WH8799> upon thee.

And he gave <WH5414> <WH8804> a sign <WH4159> the same day <WH3117>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, This is the sign <WH4159> which the YY <WH3068> hath spoken <WH1696> <WH8765>; Behold, the altar <WH4196> shall be rent <WH7167> <WH8738>, and the ashes <WH1880> that are upon it shall be poured out <WH8210> <WH8738>.

And it came to pass, when king <WH4428> Yarov`am <WH3379> heard <WH8085> <WH8800> the saying <WH1697> of the man <WH376> of 'Elohim <WH430>, which had cried <WH7121> <WH8804> against the altar <WH4196> in Beit-El <WH1008>, that he put forth <WH7971> <WH8799> his hand <WH3027> from the altar <WH4196>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Lay hold <WH8610> <WH8798> on him. And his hand <WH3027>, which he put forth <WH7971> <WH8804> against him, dried up <WH3001> <WH8799>, so that he could <WH3201> <WH8804> not pull it in again <WH7725> <WH8687> to him.

The altar <WH4196> also was rent <WH7167> <WH8738>, and the ashes <WH1880> poured out <WH8210> <WH8735> from the altar <WH4196>, according to the sign <WH4159> which the man <WH376> of 'Elohim <WH430> had given <WH5414> <WH8804> by the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068>.

And the king <WH4428> answered <WH6030> <WH8799> and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the man <WH376> of 'Elohim <WH430>, Intreat <WH2470> <WH8761> now the face <WH6440> of the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>, and pray <WH6419> <WH8690> for me, that my hand <WH3027> may be restored me again <WH7725> <WH8799>. And the man <WH376> of 'Elohim <WH430> besought <WH2470> <WH8762> <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>, and the king's <WH4428> hand <WH3027> was restored him again <WH7725> <WH8799>, and became as it was before <WH7223>.

And the king <WH4428> said <WH1696> <WH8762> unto the man <WH376> of 'Elohim <WH430>, Come <WH935> <WH8798> home <WH1004> with me, and refresh <WH5582> <WH8798> thyself, and I will give <WH5414> <WH8799> thee a reward <WH4991>.

And the man <WH376> of 'Elohim <WH430> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the king <WH4428>, If thou wilt give <WH5414> <WH8799> me half <WH2677> thine house <WH1004>, I will not go in <WH935> <WH8799> with thee, neither will I eat <WH398> <WH8799> bread <WH3899> nor drink <WH8354> <WH8799> water <WH4325> in this place <WH4725>:

For so was it charged <WH6680> <WH8765> me by the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Eat <WH398> <WH8799> no bread <WH3899>, nor drink <WH8354> <WH8799> water <WH4325>, nor turn again <WH7725> <WH8799> by the same way <WH1870> that thou camest <WH1980> <WH8804>.
So he went <WH3212> <WH8799> another <WH312> way <WH1870>, and returned <WH7725> <WH8804> not by the way <WH1870> that he came <WH935> <WH8804> to Beit-El <WH1008>.

Now there dwelt <WH3427> <WH8802> an <WH259> old <WH2205> prophet <WH5030> in Beit-El <WH1008>; and his sons <WH1121> came <WH935> <WH8799> and told <WH5608> <WH8762> him all the works <WH4639> that the man <WH376> of 'Elohim <WH430> had done <WH6213> <WH8804> that day <WH3117> in Beit-El <WH1008>: the words <WH1697> which he had spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> unto the king <WH4428>, them they told <WH5608> <WH8762> also to their father <WH1>.

And their father <WH1> said <WH1696> <WH8762> unto them, What way <WH1870> went <WH1980> <WH8804> he? For his sons <WH1121> had seen <WH7200> <WH8799> what <WH335> way <WH1870> the man <WH376> of 'Elohim <WH430> went <WH1980> <WH8804>, which came <WH935> <WH8804> from Y'hudah <WH3063>.
And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto his sons <WH1121>, Saddle <WH2280> <WH8798> me the ass <WH2543>. So they saddled <WH2280> <WH8799> him the ass <WH2543>: and he rode <WH7392> <WH8799> thereon,

And went <WH3212> <WH8799> after <WH310> the man <WH376> of 'Elohim <WH430>, and found <WH4672> <WH8799> him sitting <WH3427> <WH8802> under an oak <WH424>: and he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Art thou the man <WH376> of 'Elohim <WH430> that camest <WH935> <WH8804> from Y'hudah <WH3063>? And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, I am.
Then he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Come <WH3212> <WH8798> home <WH1004> with me, and eat <WH398> <WH8798> bread <WH3899>.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, I may <WH3201> <WH8799> not return <WH7725> <WH8800> with thee, nor go in <WH935> <WH8800> with thee: neither will I eat <WH398> <WH8799> bread <WH3899> nor drink <WH8354> <WH8799> water <WH4325> with thee in this place <WH4725>:

For it was said <WH1697> to me by the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068>, Thou shalt eat <WH398> <WH8799> no bread <WH3899> nor drink <WH8354> <WH8799> water <WH4325> there, nor turn again <WH7725> <WH8799> to go <WH3212> <WH8800> by the way <WH1870> that thou camest <WH1980> <WH8804>.

He said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, I am a prophet <WH5030> also as thou art; and an angel <WH4397> spake <WH1696> <WH8765> unto me by the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Bring him back <WH7725> <WH8685> with thee into thine house <WH1004>, that he may eat <WH398> <WH8799> bread <WH3899> and drink <WH8354> <WH8799> water <WH4325>. But he lied <WH3584> <WH8765> unto him.
So he went back <WH7725> <WH8799> with him, and did eat <WH398> <WH8799> bread <WH3899> in his house <WH1004>, and drank <WH8354> <WH8799> water <WH4325>.
And it came to pass, as they sat <WH3427> <WH8802> at the table <WH7979>, that the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came unto the prophet <WH5030> that brought him back <WH7725> <WH8689>:

And he cried <WH7121> <WH8799> unto the man <WH376> of 'Elohim <WH430> that came <WH935> <WH8804> from Y'hudah <WH3063>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>, Forasmuch as <WH3282> thou hast disobeyed <WH4784> <WH8804> the mouth <WH6310> of the YY <WH3068>, and hast not kept <WH8104> <WH8804> the Mitzvah <WH4687> which the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> thee,

But camest back <WH7725> <WH8799>, and hast eaten <WH398> <WH8799> bread <WH3899> and drunk <WH8354> <WH8799> water <WH4325> in the place <WH4725>, of the which the YY did say <WH1696> <WH8765> to thee, Eat <WH398> <WH8799> no bread <WH3899>, and drink <WH8354> <WH8799> no water <WH4325>; thy carcase <WH5038> shall not come <WH935> <WH8799> unto the sepulchre <WH6913> of thy fathers <WH1>.

And it came to pass, after <WH310> he had eaten <WH398> <WH8800> bread <WH3899>, and after <WH310> he had drunk <WH8354> <WH8800>, that he saddled <WH2280> <WH8799> for him the ass <WH2543>, to wit, for the prophet <WH5030> whom he had brought back <WH7725> <WH8689>.

And when he was gone <WH3212> <WH8799>, a lion <WH738> met <WH4672> <WH8799> him by the way <WH1870>, and slew <WH4191> <WH8686> him: and his carcase <WH5038> was cast <WH7993> <WH8716> in the way <WH1870>, and the ass <WH2543> stood <WH5975> <WH8802> by <WH681> it, the lion <WH738> also stood <WH5975> <WH8802> by the carcase <WH5038>.

And, behold, men <WH582> passed by <WH5674> <WH8802>, and saw <WH7200> <WH8799> the carcase <WH5038> cast <WH7993> <WH8716> in the way <WH1870>, and the lion <WH738> standing <WH5975> <WH8802> by <WH681> the carcase <WH5038>: and they came <WH935> <WH8799> and told <WH1696> <WH8762> it in the city <WH5892> where the old <WH2205> prophet <WH5030> dwelt <WH3427> <WH8802>.

And when the prophet <WH5030> that brought him back <WH7725> <WH8689> from the way <WH1870> heard <WH8085> <WH8799> thereof, he said <WH559> <WH8799>, It is the man <WH376> of 'Elohim <WH430>, who was dis`Ovedient <WH4784> <WH8804> unto the word <WH6310> of the YY <WH3068>: therefore the YY <WH3068> hath delivered <WH5414> <WH8799> him unto the lion <WH738>, which hath torn <WH7665> <WH8799> him, and slain <WH4191> <WH8686> him, according to the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068>, which he spake <WH1696> <WH8765> unto him.
And he spake <WH1696> <WH8762> to his sons <WH1121>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Saddle <WH2280> <WH8798> me the ass <WH2543>. And they saddled <WH2280> <WH8799> him.

And he went <WH3212> <WH8799> and found <WH4672> <WH8799> his carcase <WH5038> cast <WH7993> <WH8716> in the way <WH1870>, and the ass <WH2543> and the lion <WH738> standing <WH5975> <WH8802> by <WH681> the carcase <WH5038>: the lion <WH738> had not eaten <WH398> <WH8804> the carcase <WH5038>, nor torn <WH7665> <WH8804> the ass <WH2543>.

And the prophet <WH5030> took up <WH5375> <WH8799> the carcase <WH5038> of the man <WH376> of 'Elohim <WH430>, and laid <WH3240> <WH8686> it upon the ass <WH2543>, and brought it back <WH7725> <WH8686>: and the old <WH2205> prophet <WH5030> came <WH935> <WH8799> to the city <WH5892>, to mourn <WH5594> <WH8800> and to bury <WH6912> <WH8800> him.
And he laid <WH3240> <WH8686> his carcase <WH5038> in his own grave <WH6913>; and they mourned <WH5594> <WH8799> over him, saying, Alas <WH1945>, my brother <WH251> !

And it came to pass, after <WH310> he had buried <WH6912> <WH8800> him, that he spake <WH559> <WH8799> to his sons <WH1121>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, When I am dead <WH4191> <WH8800>, then bury <WH6912> <WH8804> me in the sepulchre <WH6913> wherein the man <WH376> of 'Elohim <WH430> is buried <WH6912> <WH8803>; lay <WH3240> <WH8685> my bones <WH6106> beside <WH681> his bones <WH6106>:

For the saying <WH1697> which he cried <WH7121> <WH8804> by the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> against the altar <WH4196> in Beit-El <WH1008>, and against all the houses <WH1004> of the high places <WH1116> which are in the cities <WH5892> of SHomron <WH8111>, shall surely come to pass.

After <WH310> this thing <WH1697> Yarov`am <WH3379> returned <WH7725> <WH8804> not from his evil <WH7451> way <WH1870>, but made <WH6213> <WH8799> again <WH7725> <WH8799> of the lowest <WH7098> of the people <WH5971> Kohanim <WH3548> of the high places <WH1116>: whosoever would <WH2655>, he consecrated <WH4390> <WH8762> <WH3027> him, and he became one of the Kohanim <WH3548> of the high places <WH1116>.

And this thing <WH1697> became sin <WH2403> unto the house <WH1004> of Yarov`am <WH3379>, even to cut it off <WH3582> <WH8687>, and to destroy <WH8045> <WH8687> it from off the face <WH6440> of the earth <WH127>.
